title: top laners why are you toxic when i tell you to build tank
body:
i told my top lane olaf with {{item:3078}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3047}}to build tank and he started rambling about how he has to carry his garbage team when hes like 10/9 and told me to stfu and get carried
we lost anyway bc he thought he could 1v5 

this happens like every game wtf
